products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Perfect Fit Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Perfect Fit Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 330mm Max Width: 1400mm
 	Min Drop: 165mm Max Drop: 1800mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.

products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included

products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Standard Panel Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Panel Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: Wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: Robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: Top fix or face fix brackets.

products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Budget Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Budget Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
